semantic_description: Add the executed stored-procedure name as an attribute on database spans so that Jaeger traces show (dbname sprocname) in the row name.

attributes_to_add.name: db.sql.procedure
attributes_to_add.value_source: the value of SqlCommand.CommandText when CommandType == CommandType.StoredProcedure

attributes_to_add.name: db.name
attributes_to_add.value_source: the database name extracted from SqlConnection.Database
